about.title: About Us
about.description1: Ibn Zohr School of Health Sciences is a private vocational training institution approved by OFPPT, dedicated to training versatile nurses and highly qualified nursing assistants.
about.description2: We believe in the power of education and the life-saving impact of quality medical training. Our mission is to ensure a constant supply of competent and dedicated health professionals. We are committed to raising awareness among our students about the importance of nursing care and supporting them throughout their training journey.
